name: UTextRenderComponent
doc: Renders text in the world with given font. Contains usual font related attributes such as Scale, Alignment, Color etc.

Text:
Text content, can be multi line using
as line separator
TextRenderColor: Color of the text, can be accessed as vertex color
WorldSize: Vertical size of the fonts largest character in world units. Transform, XScale and YScale will affect final size.
HorizSpacingAdjust: Horizontal adjustment per character, default is 0.0
VertSpacingAdjust: Vertical adjustment per character, default is 0.0
bAlwaysRenderAsText: Allows text to draw unmodified when using debug visualization modes. *

methods.name: GetTextWorldSize
methods.doc: Get world space size of text

methods.name: SetText
methods.doc: Change the text value and signal the primitives to be rebuilt

methods.name: SetFont
methods.doc: Change the font and signal the primitives to be rebuilt

methods.name: SetHorizontalAlignment
methods.doc: Change the horizontal alignment and signal the primitives to be rebuilt

methods.name: SetHorizSpacingAdjust
methods.doc: Change the text horizontal spacing adjustment and signal the primitives to be rebuilt

methods.name: SetTextMaterial
methods.doc: Change the text material and signal the primitives to be rebuilt

methods.name: SetTextRenderColor
methods.doc: Change the text render color and signal the primitives to be rebuilt

methods.name: SetVerticalAlignment
methods.doc: Change the vertical alignment and signal the primitives to be rebuilt

methods.name: SetVertSpacingAdjust
methods.doc: Change the text vertical spacing adjustment and signal the primitives to be rebuilt

methods.name: SetWorldSize
methods.doc: Change the world size of the text and signal the primitives to be rebuilt

methods.name: SetXScale
methods.doc: Change the text X scale and signal the primitives to be rebuilt

methods.name: SetYScale
methods.doc: Change the text Y scale and signal the primitives to be rebuilt
